sourceProperties.ExceptionInstructions: Add the security mark "allow_flow_logs_disabled" to the asset with a value of "true" to prevent this finding from being activated again.
sourceProperties.Explanation: VPC Flow Logs record a sample of network flows sent from and received by VM instances. These logs can be used for network monitoring, forensics, real-time security analysis, and expense optimization. Learn more at: https://cloud.google.com/vpc/docs/using-flow-logs
sourceProperties.Recommendation: Go to https://console.cloud.google.com/networking/subnetworks/details/asia-northeast1/default?project=cloud-custodian, click "Edit", and enable Flow Logs.
